overview: Pindown – the deciding moment of any keenly-fought wrestling match, when one muscular contestant wields his superior might over another in a climax of brawn, sweat and blind masculine fury. A bit like gay porn, in fact – save for the fact that it’s perhaps not quite as sticky in its final moments. Never fear, however, there’s plenty of goo to share as Orlando White and the Mendez twins get gunning in the ring for a show-stopping bonanza of hard cock and hungry twink ass. Has male wrestling ever looked so kinky – or so spunktastically hot?!
title: Pin Down
